data.message: HELP!! I was listing things for sale on Facebook yardsale sites and I am now blocked from responding to anything on Facebook. My granddaughter says that Facebook thinks I was spamming. I was only listing my stuff for sale and responding to questions. The yardsale sites allow you to 'bump' and item up in the page by typing bump in the comment box, so I don't know if the typing of bump and responding to questions is the problem, but I really did not intentionally do something wrong. Please help me get my account unblocked and tell me what I did wrong, Thanks so much

replies.message: We’re sorry you’re  experiencing this, Penny. There are a few reasons why you might not be able to post in a group. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1o7LMMX -Chantal

This is the message that I am getting from Facebook when I try to comment in my Girl Scout page--You have been temporarily blocked from performing this action.

If you think you're seeing this by mistake, please let us know
I am the admin. on the Girl Scout Page
I got blocked once..no idea what for...I would never post anything horrid..still a mystery to me x
having the same issue. for the second time this week. I got unblocked and now I'm blocked again. same thing- bumping garage sale items. no spamming.
Abdu Kadre Nura Asalamu alekum warahimatulahi wabarakatu
